title: Mountain Drake Map Changes Need to be Clearer
body:
Per the title, the rock outcrops which pop up feel super unsaturated to me and are difficult to see. They also just look _weird_ and unnatural to the rest of the rift. I would much rather they looked more solid, with more texture and depth.

What do others think?

~WT

replies.body: earthquakes cause messy stuff but I haven't tried pathing up against their edges yet, I know parts of walls on the map look thicker than they seem in some spots (flash not working moments even with indicator) or actually standing a bit inside them to hide better in nooks and crannies + fog. I wonder whether Shaco jumping a wall thicker than his indicator getting displaced to where he wants is supposed to be right, not sure about other champ jumps then again he is a demon so demons aren't really from the physical realm
